QuestData.Title: Dust of the Dead
QuestData.Description: I thought if I could just bring him here that I might be able to correct his transgression against the Light. That perhaps I could save my son! Now my beloved Arumel is a twisted phantasm.$b$bI'm left with no choice but to right my wrongs and I need your help.$b$bBring me duskwing dust from the moths on Duskfall Island. With your aid I can craft an elixir that will let us travel to the realm of the dead and lay Arumel to rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 7 Handfuls of Duskwing Dust from the Duskwing Moths on Duskfall Island.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. With this dust and Aruunem berries I will craft the draught of the dead.
